description: WTP - Performance Tuning Self-Hosted Integration Environment
Reuse Optimizer Rules in Azure Data Bricks / Spark Activities & Pipelines
Developed an Inventory Auditor that would generate a randomized report of material to count
Developed a major component tracker that showed which major components where and how many spares were in stock
Reduced inflow during rain in the City of Dayton by approximatley 40% saving residents up to $60 in fees (8,000 residents)
Met all deadlines an budgetary parameters with every project assigned
Collected leakage data and prioritized leaks on defect urgency
Our team won the Pros Internship Hackathon
We designed a web app for airline customers to find flights if they missed there connecting flight
We used node.js, lufthansa api, and ejs to create this web app
Design a robot to map and solve a maze
Implemented an AGILE methodology through scrum
Won a Summer Hackathon sponsored by NASA, TAMU and Texas Instruments
Added a solar based array (in C) to a DSTR robot which would track the sun for maximum charging and efficiency
Established a plan which allowed us to come in under budget by about 30%
